welcome_benefits: Get 10% cashback up to Rs. 500 on all transactions done within 90 days of receiving the card.

Rewards Rate: Earn 500 delight points or more on making 5 transactions worth Rs. 1000 per month. Earn 2 delight points on every Rs. 100 spent on this card.
Reward Redemption: Redeem delight points for making payments for dining, shopping, utility bills, holidays, gifts and entertainment.
Travel: Get complimentary access to both domestic and international airport lounges.
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 complimentary access to domestic lounges each quarter
International Lounge Access: 4 complimentary access to international lounges each year
Insurance Benefits: Covers accidental death insurance and permanent disability up to Rs.10 lakhs each.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee will be waived off on spending Rs. 90,000 in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived at all petrol pumps across India on transactions between Rs. 400 - Rs. 4000. The maximum waiver of fuel surcharges is Rs. 400 per month.

product_details: The IDBI Winnings RuPay Select Credit Card comes with no joining fee.
As a welcome benefit, get 10% cashback up to Rs. 500 on all transactions.
500 delight points on making 5 transactions worth Rs. 1000 per month.
Get double delight points in your Birthday month.
2 delight points on every Rs. 100 spent on this card.
Covers accidental death and permanent disability insurance up to Rs. 10 lakhs for each.
Avail 1% fuel surcharge waiver, maximum waiver of Rs. 400 per month.
